channel.title: Hybrid PVP - Bosses Not Dropping
channel.description:
I have followed the tutorial [code]#NAME HERE ID:RARITY LEVEL 995:20000 808:129 886:127 391:2 207:2 3051:2 213:2 11710:1 11712:1 11714:1 11724:1 11726:1 11728:1 989:1[/code]
In NPC.java, theres a limit of 10k for max NPCs in NPC.cfg and drops. The int's are at the top of the class, so they should be easy to see. Just expand them, and it should work.
But I added it to NPC.cfg and they still don't drop. I don't understand what to do to make them drop, can someone please help, HYBRIDPVP base.

item.title: Hybrid PVP - Bosses Not Dropping

item.description:

I have followed the tutorial

In NPC.java, theres a limit of 10k for max NPCs in NPC.cfg and drops. The int's are at the top of the class, so they should be easy to see. Just expand them, and it should work.

But I added it to NPC.cfg and they still don’t drop.
